Feb. 25, 1967 D Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Fourth Section)
Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Brass Band Championship yorkshire-brass-band-championship-fourth-section

Fourth
Neapolitan Suite
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Organised by Yorkshire BBA in protest to National Brass Band Council stating which test pieces should be used at all area contests. Qualifying contest held at Leeds Town Hall on 26th March.
